Pre-Game Insights: Japan secured two victories in their pre-tournament matches ahead of the 2024 ICC Men's T20 World Cup East Asia-Pacific Sub-regional Qualifier B.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The tournament will feature 12 matches among the four teams.
Others: The ICC Men's T20 WC East Asia-Pacific Sub-regional Qualifier B 2024 will take place from September 28, 2024 to October 5, 2024.
